name: Leonid Libkin
content: Leonid Libkin Leonid Libkin Professor, School of Informatics Laboratory for Foundations of Computer Science University of Edinburgh Informatics Forum, IF 5.33, Crichton Street Edinburgh, EH8 9AB, UK Email: last_name at ed . ac . uk Telephone: + 44 (0) 131 651 3816, Fax: +44 (0) 131 651 1426 Research Interests Databases: query languages for relational and graph databases, incomplete data, constraints and design, data integration and exchange, etc. Logic in computer science, finite model theory, automata theory In the past: lattice theory, with some applications to programming semantics. Books Principles of Databases Papers (most of them online) Teaching Former students and postdocs   (prospective students and postdocs - please email me) Database Theory Look here for information about applying to study for a PhD in Informatics at Edinburgh..
